titleStmt.title: An awakening warning to the wofull world by a voyce in three nations uttered in a brief dissertation concerning that fatal and to be admired conjunction of all the planets in one and the same sign, Sagittarius ... to come to pass the 1/11 day of December, anno 1662 : in which it is clearly evinced, as well by S. Scriptures ... that the glorious coming of Jesus Christ is at hand ... / autore Petro Serario.
titleStmt.author: Serrurier, Petrus.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
